content: Hi All, we're trying to build an app using FHIR to provide Sexually transmitted diseases (STDs) information. Anyone can suggest some data to start?
I've heard that the retirees in Florida are pretty frisky.....

@Xueting your question is a bit unclear. Are you looking for a test system that contains relevant data? If so, that might be a bit hard to come by. I'm not aware of any that would contain a decent range of Observations, Conditions and associated CarePlan, MedicationRequest and other resources that are specificly STD-related.
